section.section: A lessor shall disclose to a consumer the information required under this subtitle.
In a transaction involving more than 1 lessor, only 1 lessor need make the disclosures required under this subtitle, but all lessors shall be bound by the disclosures made.

text.section: A lessor shall make the disclosures required under this subtitle before consummation of the rental-purchase agreement.

A lessor shall:
Make the disclosures required under this subtitle in a written form that is simple and understandable and is written or typed in a size not less than 10 point type;
Make the disclosures required under this subtitle on the face of the rental-purchase agreement above the consumer's signature line; and
Deliver a copy of the rental-purchase agreement to the consumer.

If a disclosure becomes inaccurate as a result of any act, occurrence, or agreement by the consumer after delivery of the rental property, the resulting inaccuracy is not a violation of this subtitle.
